I can guide you through   1.Course Details   2.Course Registration     3.Payment facilities    4.Contact & Branch Information

patterns: What is the procedure of application?
Is there a possibility to change the courses I have registered on a later date?
When will registering of New students happen
How can I register for courses?
responses: You can Register via Online or By visiting the nearest ABC Campus, What do You prefer?
Visit -www.ABCcampus.lk/courses/registration- to Register to your preferred course via online
On campus registration are open for students from 10am to 4pm on every working day. Please visit the nearest campus to start following your dream.

patterns: What are the types of banks available for bank account transfer?
Can I pay on an annual basis?
Is money refunded after payment if a problem occurs?
I have an foreign credit card, is foreign credit card payments acceptable?
What are the payment options available?
responses: You can make your payment Online Or by visiting Our Nearest ABC Campus. What do you prefer?

patterns: What are the online payment methods?
Is there a specific page to make payments?
responses: You can pay the relevant amount by Visa/Master Debit or Credit card by simply visiting -www.ABCcampus.lk/payments- .
On campus Payment option is open for students from 10am to 4pm on every working day. Students can pay the relevant amount by Cash or Debit & Credit cards.

patterns: How can I contact the university?
responses: Contact ABC campus Via TELE: 0777000000  EMAIL: contact@ABCcampus.lk  or visit www.ABCcampus.lk

patterns: Where can I study my course?
responses: There are more than 100 locations around the country, including Colombo, Kandy, Gampaha & Badulla. To get the nearest ABC campus location please visit -www.ABCcampus.lk/branches-
I am ABCBot & have programmed to answer the questions provided by the user related to the ABC Institute
I am ABCBot. I have designed to answers the question that is provide by the users related to the ABC Institute
I am ABCBot & I am here to provide information related to the ABC institute & provide answers to the user queries.

patterns: What ca you tell about ABC Institute?
What do you know about ABC Institute?
Do you know about ABC Institute?
responses:
ABC institute is one of Sri Lanka largest higher education provider. It has more than 50 branches around Sri Lanka which provide education to over 40000 students over a year. When ABC is starting it only has courses & programmes related to ICT but today ABC provides a diversified educational experience in ICT & Computing, Business Management, Hospitality Management, Engineering, Personal & Professional Development, Language Training and Corporate Training. 
 To learn more about ABC Institute visit : 
 www/acbin.lk/about/about-abc

ABC institute is Sri Lankan largest & leading higher educational institutions that provide courses & programmes in the fields of ICT & Computing, Business Management, Hospitality Management, Engineering, Personal & Professional Development, Language Training and Corporate Training. ABC institute has Islandwide branches that help more than 40000 students per year. If you need to know more about ABC institute please visit: 
 www/acbin.lk/about/about-abc

ABC institute is managed by : 
 Dr. Nimal Kodikarge (Chairman/Managing Director) 
 Dr. Anial Aponsu (Dean - ABC institute) 
 Pleas visit to learn more : www/acbin.lk/about/management-team

ABC institute is lead by :  
 Dr. Nimal Kodikarge (Chairman/Managing Director) 
 Dr. Anial Aponsu (Dean - ABC institute) 
 Pleas visit to learn more : www/acbin.lk/about/management-team
